meanings.definition: A photograph that one has taken of oneself, typically with a smartphone.
meanings.sent1: She loves to take a selfie every morning before school.
meanings.sent2: He posted a selfie on social media to show his new haircut.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally took a selfie with its paw on the camera.
meanings.sent4: The selfie captured her smile like a mirror reflecting happiness.
meanings.sent5: The selfie revealed her excitement through a joyful pose.

meanings.definition: The act of taking a photograph of oneself.
meanings.sent1: Taking a selfie can be a fun way to capture memories.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her selfie skills to get the perfect shot.
meanings.sent3: The group decided to have a selfie competition to see who could pose the best.
meanings.sent4: His selfie game was strong, always finding the best angles.
meanings.sent5: The selfie-taking session turned into a laughter-filled photo shoot.
